message.content: {"given_definition_quality":55,"better_definition":"to give as a present, to deliver, or to see someone off","sentence":"我送他回家。","image_prompt":"A soft apocalypse animated scene showing one person (simple, friendly style) walking another person to a simple home, outdoor setting, one person waving goodbye near the house. Subtle city ruins and gentle nature overgrowth in the background for an apocalyptic touch, soft pastel colors, friendly mood.","sentence_translation":"I walk him home."}
